008 *******************************************************************************/
009package Ch08_BinaryRegions;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
013
014import java.awt.Color;
015import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
016import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
017import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
018import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Locale;
021
022import ij.IJ;
023import ij.ImagePlus;
024import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
025import ij.gui.Overlay;
026import ij.gui.Roi;
027import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
028import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
029import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
030import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
031import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.NeighborhoodType2D;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
033import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
034import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
035import imagingbook.common.regions.segment.RegionContourSegmentation;
036
037/**
038 * Performs binary region segmentation, then
039 * displays each region's major axis (scaled by eccentricity)
040 * and equivalent ellipse as a vector overlay.
041 * Eccentricity values are limited to {@link #MaxEccentricity},
042 * axes are marked red if exceeded.
043 * Axes for regions with {@code NaN} eccentricity value (single-pixel regions) 
044 * are not displayed.
045 * Axis and ellipse parameters are calculated from the region's central
046 * moments.
047 * <br>
048 * This plugin expects a binary (black and white) image with background = 0 and 
049 * foreground &gt; 0.
050 * 
051 * @author WB
052 * @version 2021/04/18
053 */
054public class Region_Eccentricity_Ellipse_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
055        
056        static {
057                Locale.setDefault(Locale.US);
058        }
059        
060        private static NeighborhoodType2D NhT = NeighborhoodType2D.N4;
061        
062        private static double   AxisScale = 1.0;
063        private static int              MinRegionSize = 10;
064        private static double   MaxEccentricity = 100;
065        
066        private static Color    AxisColor = Color.magenta;
067        private static Color    AxisColorVoid = Color.red;
068        private static Color    MarkerColor = Color.orange;
069        private static Color    EllipseColor = Color.green;
070        
071        private static double   AxisLineWidth = 1.5;
072        private static double   MarkerRadius = 3;
073        private static double   MarkerLineWidth = 0.75;
074        
075        private static boolean  ShowCenterMark = true;
076        private static boolean  ShowMajorAxis = true;
077        private static boolean  ShowEllipse = true;
078        
079        private ImagePlus im = null;
080
081        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
082                this.im = im;
083                return DOES_8G;
084        }
085
086        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
087                
088                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
089                        IJ.showMessage("Plugin requires a binary image!");
090                        return;
091                }
092                
093                if (!getUserInput()) {
094                        return;
095                }
096                
097                int w = ip.getWidth();
098                int h = ip.getHeight();
099                double unitLength = sqrt(w * h) * 0.005 * AxisScale;
100                                
101                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
102                
103                // perform region segmentation:
104                RegionContourSegmentation segmenter = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor) ip, NhT);
105                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions();
106
107                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
108                        int n = r.getSize();
109                        if (n < MinRegionSize) {
110                                continue;
111                        }
112                        
113                        Pnt2d ctr = r.getCenter();
114                        double xc = ctr.getX() + 0.5;
115                        double yc = ctr.getY() + 0.5;
116                        
117                        if (ShowCenterMark) {
118                                Roi marker = makeCenterMark(xc, yc, MarkerRadius);
119                                marker.setStrokeColor(MarkerColor);
120                                marker.setStrokeWidth(MarkerLineWidth);
121                                oly.add(marker);
122                        }
123                        
124                        double[] mu = r.getCentralMoments();    // = (mu10, mu01, mu20, mu02, mu11)
125                        double mu20 = mu[0];
126                        double mu02 = mu[1];
127                        double mu11 = mu[2];
128                        
129                        double theta = 0.5 * Math.atan2(2 * mu11, mu20 - mu02); // axis angle   
130                                
131                        double A = mu20 + mu02;
132                        double B = sqr(mu20 - mu02) + 4 * sqr(mu11);
133                        if (B < 0) {
134                                throw new RuntimeException("negative B: " + B); // this should never happen
135                        }               
136                        double a1 = A + sqrt(B);                // see book eq. 10.34
137                        double a2 = A - sqrt(B);
138                        double ecc = a1 / a2;                   // = (A + sqrt(B)) / (A - sqrt(B))                              
139                        
140                        if (ShowMajorAxis && !Double.isNaN(ecc)) {
141                                // ignore single pixel regions: A + sqrt(B) == A - sqrt(B) == 0
142                                Color axisCol = AxisColor;                      // default color
143                                if (ecc > MaxEccentricity) {            // limit eccentricity (may be infinite)
144                                        ecc = MaxEccentricity;
145                                        axisCol = AxisColorVoid;                // mark as beyond maximum
146                                }
147                                double len = ecc * unitLength;
148                                double dx = Math.cos(theta) * len;
149                                double dy = Math.sin(theta) * len;
150                                Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(new Line2D.Double(xc, yc, xc + dx, yc + dy));
151                                roi.setStrokeWidth(AxisLineWidth);
152                                roi.setStrokeColor(axisCol);
153                                oly.add(roi);
154                        }
155                        
156                        if (ShowEllipse) {
157                                double ra = sqrt(2 * a1 / n);
158                                double rb = sqrt(2 * a2 / n);
159                                Roi roi = makeEllipse(xc, yc, ra, rb, theta);
160                                roi.setStrokeWidth(AxisLineWidth);
161                                roi.setStrokeColor(EllipseColor);
162                                oly.add(roi);
163                                
164//                              // same result via Eigenvalues:
165//                              Eigensolver2x2 es = new Eigensolver2x2(mu20, mu11, mu11, mu02);
166//                              double lambda0 = es.getEigenvalue(0);
167//                              double lambda1 = es.getEigenvalue(1);
168//                              double ra2 = 2 * sqrt(lambda0 / n);
169//                              double rb2 = 2 * sqrt(lambda1 / n);
170//                              IJ.log(String.format("V1: ra=%.2f rb=%.2f", ra, rb));
171//                              IJ.log(String.format("V2: ra=%.2f rb=%.2f", ra2, rb2));
172//                              IJ.log("");
173                        }       
174                }
175                
176                im.setOverlay(oly);
177        }
178        
179        public Roi makeEllipse(double xc, double yc, double ra, double rb, double theta) {
180                Ellipse2D e = new Ellipse2D.Double(-ra, -rb, 2 * ra, 2 * rb);
181                AffineTransform t = new AffineTransform();
182                t.translate(xc, yc);
183                t.rotate(theta);
184                return new ShapeRoi(t.createTransformedShape(e));
185        }
186        
187        private Roi makeCenterMark(double x, double y, double r) {
188                Path2D.Double m = new Path2D.Double();
189                m.moveTo(x - r, y - r);
190                m.lineTo(x + r, y + r);
191                m.moveTo(x + r, y - r);
192                m.lineTo(x - r, y + r);
193                return new ShapeRoi(m);
194        }
195        
196        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
197        
198        private boolean getUserInput() {
199                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
200                gd.addEnumChoice("Neighborhood type", NhT);
201                gd.addNumericField("Min. region size", MinRegionSize, 0);
202                gd.addNumericField("Max. eccentricity", MaxEccentricity, 0);
203                gd.addNumericField("Axis scale", AxisScale, 1);
204                gd.addCheckbox("Show center marks", ShowCenterMark);
205                gd.addCheckbox("Show major axes", ShowMajorAxis);
206                gd.addCheckbox("Show ellipses", ShowEllipse);
207                                
208                gd.showDialog();
209                if (gd.wasCanceled())
210                        return false;
211
212                NhT = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NeighborhoodType2D.class);
213                MinRegionSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
214                MaxEccentricity = gd.getNextNumber();
215                AxisScale = gd.getNextNumber();
216                
217                ShowCenterMark = gd.getNextBoolean();
218                ShowMajorAxis = gd.getNextBoolean();
219                ShowEllipse = gd.getNextBoolean();
220                return true;
221        }
222
223}
